resources.string:
This application will help you generate a strong password in order to secure your accounts on various social sites 

Please make sure that you save the password somewhere as passwordy does not save it for you .

About the developers-
 This app is developed by two amateurs as a practice project . Thus it may have concerning flaws .

However we would love to have your suggestions .
 Developed by @virat.mishra24 and @rickykapoor__27
